channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Very noisy drain cover with large chunks of dislodged tarmac, 5th December
item.description:
Been there for months, unable to find a report on FMS so I can track progress, separate report raised to request clean up of chunks of the dislodged tarmac on the road. Will this be covered by the overnight carriageway repairs scheduled for 8/9 December? Many thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 99-101, High Street, Goddington, Orpington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: People have set up a camp in Kingswood Glen, 5th December
item.description:
People have set up camp in Kingswood Glen. They are burning fires everyday. It is also a safety concern for children who walk to school down the pathway alone. They have tramped down a pathway on the left hand side as you come into her Glen from the South Hill Wood end. They cannot be seen from the pathway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 58, South Hill Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement by Manor House Drive bus stop, 5th December
item.description:
Piles of leaves turning to dirt on the footpath as they have been there for over two months and are not only visually unpleasant but also a slip hazard.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brondesbury Park, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog fouling, 5th December
item.description:
Chatsworth Road and surrounding area - constant dog fouling on the high street from multiple dog owners. This is well known to the Council and needs a targeted campaign to clean it up and to heavily fine dog owners. The neighbourhood is disgusting.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chatsworth Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Slippery ice patches, 5th December
item.description:
Ice along the pavement- slippery and could lead to falls down the slope
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Park Road, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On footpath ., 5th December
item.description:
Fly tipping constantly being done at the top of the steps of Milton road . There are items now on the public footpath which is part of the Green Chain walk . The lighting is very poor at the top of the steps , so it is only a matter of time before a member of the public gets hurt .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Milton Road, Lessness Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
